feed.title: Kraus Dev House
feed.subtitle: Kraus Dev House offers strategic technical consulting to software companies. As an independent consultant, I provide a range of services, including technology roadmap development, architecture design, code review, project management, visual strategic analysis. My approach is holistic and considerate of the long-term goals and strategic positioning of your organization. I pride myself on being able to provide tailored solutions for my clients, and I am dedicated to participating in the innovation of my field.
